name: G.G Series VECTOR
synopsis: Falling blocks with arrows need to be arranged according to color and arrow direction! Manipulate the blocks and their arrows to create a path or "Vector" of four or more to clear them from the screen. If the blocks pile up to the top of the screen, it's game over. Choose from Easy to Expert mode. Beware, blocks may change direction randomly without warning on the highest difficulty setting. Stay alert and aim for the highest score and the largest combo in your goal for mastery over the "Vector"!
